entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023
